name: Lost Mine of Phandelver
description: A classic introductory adventure for D&D 5th Edition. Escort a wagon to Phandalin and uncover a lost mine.

chapters.title: Goblin Arrows
chapters.description: Ambush on the road to Phandalin. A goblin ambush party attacks the heroes while they escort a supply wagon.

chapters.title: Phandalin
chapters.description: Explore the frontier town of Phandalin, meet the townsfolk, and learn about the Redbrands terrorizing the area.

chapters.title: The Spider's Web
chapters.description: Track the villainous Black Spider through various locations around the Sword Coast.

chapters.title: Wave Echo Cave
chapters.description: The legendary lost mine of the Phandelver's Pact awaits deep underground.

npcs.name: Gundren Rockseeker
npcs.description: A dwarf entrepreneur who hired the party to escort his supply wagon. He's discovered the entrance to the legendary Wave Echo Cave.

npcs.name: Sildar Hallwinter
npcs.description: A human warrior and agent of the Lords' Alliance, traveling with Gundren. Captured by goblins.

npcs.name: Glasstaff (Iarno Albrek)
npcs.description: A wizard who leads the Redbrand ruffians from beneath Tresendar Manor. Secretly working for the Black Spider.

npcs.name: The Black Spider (Nezznar)
npcs.description: A drow wizard seeking to harness the magical power of the Forge of Spells in Wave Echo Cave.

name: Dragon of Icespire Peak
description: A young white dragon has claimed Icespire Peak, driving dangerous creatures into the surrounding area. Take on quests from the Phandalin job board to protect the town.

chapters.title: Phandalin Quests
chapters.description: Take on starter quests from the job board: Umbrage Hill, Dwarven Excavation, and Gnomengarde.

chapters.title: Follow-Up Quests
chapters.description: Investigate the growing threat: Butterskull Ranch, Loggers' Camp, and the Mountain's Toe Gold Mine.

chapters.title: Advanced Quests
chapters.description: Confront Dragon Barrow, Woodland Manse, and the Tower of Storms as Cryovain draws closer.

chapters.title: Icespire Hold
chapters.description: Climb to the dragon's lair and face Cryovain, the young white dragon, in a final showdown.

npcs.name: Harbin Wester
npcs.description: The nervous and cowardly townmaster of Phandalin who posts quests on the job board.

npcs.name: Adabra Gwynn
npcs.description: A midwife and healer living at Umbrage Hill who needs rescue from a manticore.

npcs.name: Cryovain
npcs.description: A young white dragon that has claimed Icespire Peak as its lair, terrorizing the region.

name: Curse of Strahd: Death House
description: An introductory adventure leading into the dark realm of Barovia. Explore a haunted townhouse with a terrible secret in its basement.

chapters.title: The Durst Manor
chapters.description: Two ghostly children beckon the heroes into their home, begging them to save their baby brother from the monster in the basement.

chapters.title: Upper Floors
chapters.description: Explore the increasingly disturbing upper floors of the manor, uncovering the dark history of the Durst family.

chapters.title: The Dungeon Level
chapters.description: Descend into the hidden cult dungeon beneath the house, where the Dursts once performed dark rituals.

npcs.name: Rose and Thorn Durst
npcs.description: The ghostly children of Gustav and Elisabeth Durst, trapped in the attic where they starved to death.

npcs.name: Strahd von Zarovich (Referenced)
npcs.description: The vampire lord of Barovia. His dark influence permeates the mists. Referenced in letters found in the house.

name: The Sunless Citadel
description: A classic dungeon crawl into a ruined fortress that has sunk into the earth. Goblins, kobolds, and a corrupted druid guard its depths.

chapters.title: Into the Ravine
chapters.description: Descend into the ravine to find the sunken citadel. Navigate traps and encounter kobold sentries.

chapters.title: The Fortress Level
chapters.description: Explore the upper level of the citadel, currently occupied by warring goblin and kobold factions.

chapters.title: The Grove Level
chapters.description: Descend to the underground grove where the Gulthias Tree grows, corrupting all around it.

npcs.name: Meepo
npcs.description: A forlorn kobold who has lost his clan's dragon wyrmling, Calcryx. He begs the adventurers for help.

npcs.name: Belak the Outcast
npcs.description: A mad druid who tends the corrupted Gulthias Tree deep within the citadel.

npcs.name: Calcryx
npcs.description: A white dragon wyrmling captured by goblins from the kobolds.

name: Beginner Box: Menace Under Otari
description: An introductory Pathfinder 2e adventure beneath the town of Otari.

chapters.title: Fishery Basement
chapters.description: Investigate strange noises coming from the basement of Tamily Tanderveil's fishery.

chapters.title: Kobold Warrens
chapters.description: Descend deeper underground into twisting kobold tunnels.

chapters.title: The Shrine
chapters.description: Discover an ancient shrine to a forgotten deity — the true source of the menace.

npcs.name: Tamily Tanderveil
npcs.description: Owner of the fishery above the dungeon. She hires the adventurers to investigate the noises.

npcs.name: Zolgran
npcs.description: The cunning kobold leader who commands the warrens beneath Otari.

name: Troubles in Otari
description: Continue the adventure in Otari! New threats emerge as the heroes become local protectors. A follow-up to the Beginner Box adventure.

chapters.title: The Osprey Cove Caves
chapters.description: Smugglers have set up operations in sea caves near Otari. Investigate their dealings and root them out.

chapters.title: Stonescale Kobolds
chapters.description: A new kobold tribe, the Stonescales, have emerged and are raiding outlying farms.

chapters.title: The Gauntlight Ruins
chapters.description: Strange lights emanate from the ruins of an ancient lighthouse. What lurks within?

chapters.title: Showdown at Otari
chapters.description: All threats converge on the town of Otari. Defend it against a coordinated assault.

npcs.name: Captain Longsaddle
npcs.description: The grizzled captain of the Otari town guard. A retired adventurer who provides guidance.

npcs.name: Jaul Mezmin
npcs.description: The ruthless leader of the Osprey Cove smuggling ring.

name: The Fall of Plaguestone
description: A caravan journey turns deadly when a fellow traveler is murdered. Investigate the crime and uncover a sinister alchemical plot threatening the village of Etran's Folly.

chapters.title: Murder on the Road
chapters.description: During the caravan's stop at Plaguestone, a merchant is murdered. The heroes must investigate.

chapters.title: The Blight
chapters.description: Follow the trail of clues to discover the source of a strange blight affecting the village's crops.

chapters.title: The Alchemist's Lab
chapters.description: Storm the hidden laboratory where a deranged alchemist is creating weapons of mass destruction.

npcs.name: Bort Bargith
npcs.description: The murdered merchant whose death kicks off the investigation.

npcs.name: Vilree
npcs.description: A bitter alchemist seeking revenge on the village that wronged her family. The main antagonist.

npcs.name: Sir Lawren
npcs.description: A kind knight and caravan guard who helps the party in their investigation.

name: Abomination Vaults: Gauntlight
description: Explore the first level of the Abomination Vaults megadungeon beneath Gauntlight, an ancient lighthouse that has begun to glow with eerie light.

chapters.title: The Gauntlight
chapters.description: Investigate the mysterious lighthouse above the dungeon. Its light pulses with necromantic energy.

chapters.title: Level One: The Ruins
chapters.description: Enter the first level of the vaults — crumbling ruins inhabited by creatures drawn to the dark magic.

chapters.title: The Belcorra Connection
chapters.description: Discover clues about Belcorra Haruvex, the sorceress whose evil still permeates the vaults.

chapters.title: The First Seal
chapters.description: Reach and weaken the first seal keeping Belcorra's power contained — but at what cost?

npcs.name: Wrin Sivinxi
npcs.description: An eccentric elf astrologer and shop owner in Otari who first notices the Gauntlight's strange behavior.

npcs.name: Belcorra Haruvex (Legacy)
npcs.description: An ancient sorceress whose malevolence created the Abomination Vaults centuries ago. Her influence persists.
